alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:17AM CST until February 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain and sleet expected. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 16 degrees. * WHERE...Duval County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
